attributes.action: Remove the inherent  'Anglophobia'  from  the Governments social policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Anglophobia' is the hatred of England and all things English.  It is nothing other than; 'reverse discrimination'.
